sql: SELECT IF(gen.nombrecorto IS NULL OR gen.nombrecorto='',gen.razonsocial,gen.nombrecorto) AS Item,COUNT(DISTINCT idmanifiesto,idgenerador,fecha) AS Cantidad FROM manifiesto AS man INNER JOIN relgenman USING(idmanifiesto) INNER JOIN generador AS gen USING(idgenerador) __WHR__ AND YEAR(man.fecha) = IF(MONTH(CURDATE())=1,YEAR(CURDATE())-1,YEAR(CURDATE())) AND MONTH(man.fecha) = IF(MONTH(CURDATE())=1,12,MONTH(CURDATE())-1) AND ((motivo IS NOT NULL AND motivo != '') OR idmanifiesto IN (SELECT idmanifiesto FROM relmanrec)) GROUP BY gen.razonsocial ORDER BY Cantidad Desc
